roleset.name: cause to go deaf
roleset.note: DEAFEN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'deafen' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, but should go in with the causatives. (from deafen.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: agentive adjective
example.text: Deafening chants of ``ANC'' and ``Umkhonto we Sizwe'' shook the church as the seven aging men vowed that the ANC would continue its fight against the government and the policies of racial segregation on all fronts, including the armed struggle.

example.name: verbal
example.text: John's bagpipe lessons deafened the entire neighborhood.

roleset.name: be unable to hear
roleset.note: DEAF-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from deaf.01-j)

example.name: physical
example.text: She is deaf in the left ear.
